README:
Mposterior: R package for Robust and Scalable Bayes via a Median of Subset Posterior Measures

Mposterior package facilitates easy estimation of a median of subset posterior measures called M-posterior. We assume that the user already has samples from the subset posterior measures. 

For theoretical details and practical motivation for M-posterior, please see Minsker et al. 2014.

Stanislav Minsker, Sanvesh Srivastava, Lizhen Lin, and David B. Dunson (2014). Robust and Scalable Bayes via a Median of Subset Posterior Measures. http://arxiv.org/abs/1403.2660

--
Maintainer: Sanvesh Srivastava <sanvesh@gmail.com>
description: :exclamation: This is a read-only mirror of the CRAN R package repository.  Mposterior — Mposterior: R package for Robust and Scalable Bayes via a Median of Subset Posterior Measures. Homepage: http://www.stat.duke.edu/~ss602/Mposterior/Mposterior.html
